content: The API key is displayed only once upon saving and is then hidden for security purposes. If it is reset, a new key must be provided; otherwise, AI features, including the chat, will be unavailable.

comment.text: This key provides a message displayed in the AI provider settings dialog, explaining that the API key is only shown once and must be reset to obtain a new key to enable AI features. It clarifies the security implications of not resetting the key and the resulting loss of functionality.

usage.context:
removeMargin > {isKeyInputHidden ? (
{t("AISettings:ResetProviderKeyDescription")}
